name: V1_Ch7_OperatorAlgebra_Theorem
intent: Assert that the primitive operators and meta-operators form a closed semantic operator algebra under Ω.

constraints.closure: Operator algebra closed under defined operations.
constraints.identity: There exists an identity operator I with I∘A = A∘I = A.
constraints.inverse_partial: Some operators may admit formal inverses on restricted domains.
constraints.Ω-regularity: All algebraic constructions must respect Ω constraints.

cross_links.volume1_module_pack: Operator algebra underlies Volume I operator_pack.
cross_links.volume2_dynamics: Emergent dynamics in Volume II use this algebra heavily.
